import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import css from "@emotion/css"; import { Formik } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; import Cookies from "js-cookie"; import * as STYLES from "../../../components/General/modalStyles"; const ConferenceModal = ({ openModal, confData }) => { console.log("confData", confData); const ProfileId = Cookies.get("employeeID"); const [openSnackbar, closeSnackbar] = useSnackbar(); //YUP validation schema const confUpdateSchema = Yup.object().shape({ typeOfconferencename: Yup.string().required("Required"), titleConference: Yup.string().required("Required"), conferencetype: Yup.string().required("Required"), organize: Yup.string().required("Required"), confmonthYear: Yup.string().required("Required"), issntype: Yup.string().required("Required"), issnIsbnNo: Yup.string().required("Required"), issuetype: Yup.string().required("Required"), issueNo: Yup.string().required("Required"), deptId: Yup.string().required("Required"), conferenceID: yup.string().required("Required"), }); return ( Conference Details { console.log(value); }} > {({ values, errors, touched, handleChange, handleBlur, handleSubmit, }) => (
Title Of The Paper
)} ); }; export default ConferenceModal;
